title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ding 2: Convince Astarion not to Ascend; Decide Prisoners' Fate

This choice will directly affect the outcome of the prisoners. When Astarion asks for your help, put focus on the prisoners or Astarion by choosing either of the following dialogue:

You can't finish the ritual - you'll kill all these people! Didn't you hear him? If you complete the ritual, you'll be consumed.

Astarion will respond, "Trust me - I know what I'm doing. . . But if I complete the ritual, think of the power I'll have.
